Name: Desert Eagle
Description: The Desert Eagle is a powerful semi-automatic handgun, renowned for its high stopping power and iconic design, making it a favorite among collectors.

Name: G18
Description: The G18 is a compact and versatile handgun that can switch between semi-automatic and fully automatic firing modes, ideal for various combat scenarios.

Name: M1911
Description: The M1911 is a classic .45 caliber handgun known for its reliability and accuracy, widely used by military and law enforcement personnel.

Name: M79
Description: The M79 is a single-shot grenade launcher, famous for its ability to deliver explosive rounds, making it a powerful choice in combat.

Name: M9
Description: The M9 is a standard-issue military handgun, valued for its durability, accuracy, and compatibility with various ammunition types.

Name: Nagant M1895
Description: The Nagant M1895 is a unique revolver known for its innovative gas-seal system, offering increased muzzle velocity and accuracy.

Name: Rhino
Description: The Rhino is a modern revolver with a distinctive design, known for its reduced recoil and ergonomic grip, suitable for both novice and experienced shooters.

Name: Sawnoff
Description: The Sawnoff shotgun is a compact firearm, ideal for close-range encounters, known for its devastating power despite its small size.

Name: vz61 Skorpion
Description: The vz61 Skorpion is a lightweight submachine gun, compact and easy to handle, designed for rapid fire in close-quarters combat.
